item.title: A small Orange Review and coupon codes (2018)
item.description: This month, i decided to switch hosting from ******* to some other service. As there are many website hosting companies, i was confused to decide which one should I signup for. I was impressed with reviews on Hostgator, Inmotion, Bluehost and A2webhosting but I ended signing up for a small orange. ASO was suggested by some that folks have their blogs deployed on ASO servers. It has been a week since I moved my blog. I’m very satisfied with theÂ performance of my new host. Here’s my review of a small orange hosting.
